page.title: 07AGRICULTURE
page.content: THIS IS FAR AND AWAY NTHE MOST IMPORTANTLAND COVER AND PROBABLY THE BIGGEST EMPLOYER.TWO BRANCHES OF AGRICULTURE ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE BULK OF FARMING ACTIVITY - INTENSIVE ARABLE AND MARKET GARDENING. THE MARKET GARDENING PRODUCES VEGETABLES FOR THE GRIMSBY MARKET SOME 16 MILES AWAY.ITS EXISTENCE IS FACILITATED BY THE OCCURRENCE OF A BELT OF VERY LIGHT SOIL WHICH IS A PRODUCT OF THE MIXING TOGETHER OF SAND DERIVED FROM AN ANCIENT LINE OF SANDHILLS (A 13TH CENTURY STORM BEACH) AND THE HEAVIER MARINE CLAYS OF THE OUTMARSH.THE MAIN PRODUCTS ARE POTATOES,CARROTS,LETTUCE ANS CABBAGES. ONLY ONE GROWER HAS HOT HOUSE TOMATOES AND THE SAME MAN IS A SPECIALIST CELERY GROWER.MANY PEOPLE GROW ON A SMALL SCALE AND USE THE FULL-TIME GROWERS AS OUTLETS .
